Abstract Continuation Strategy to be inherited by developer for any new Continuation Strategy.

class src.continuation.natural_continuation.NaturalContinuation(state, bparam, counter, objective, output_file, hparams)[source]¶

Natural Continuation strategy.

Composed of natural predictor and unconstrained corrector

run()[source]¶

Runs the continuation strategy.

A continuation strategy that defines how predictor and corrector components of the algorithm interact with the states of the mathematical system.
